name: Driving School: Parking Skill
description:
Driving School: Parking Skill Sim 3D will also let you learn the art of parking and handing various types of car cranes, machinery, construction trucks, construction cranes, city builder cranes, forklifts, excavators and you will learn how to navigate realistic cars and vehicles in this parking environment. As an expert city builder and construction crane driver you have driven a lot of heavy cranes and trucks, but this parking lot real car park simulator is quite a challenge. Follow the way points and directions in this driving school and car-parking simulator
Features:
Test your driving skills by learning how to drive from best driving school.
Perfectly park car without hitting others in latest parking simulator.
10 challenging missions of driving and parking vehicles.
Responsive & intuitive controls.
Learn how to start engine, apply brake, boost speed & control steering wheel.
